Buena historia que te engancha, tenes que pensarla un poquito lo cual me encanta, doblaje gustable aunque sea español de españa, el bueno se hace malo pero aca es mas entendible porque es un robot para joder a glados.
muy buenos graficos a pesar que ya es un juego de hace mas de una decada (no es tan importante pero es de aclarar ;) )
Ahora, no creo que haya una tercera entrega, su historia termino muy bien y estoy mas que complacido; aunque no se vea, yo ya termine el juego mas de 3 veces, una en play 3 y otras 2 en pc y joder como la pase. Incluso me gustaria que no lo tocaran porque hasta ahora sigue siendo una obra de arte.

I remember first seeing this game for the first time a decade ago on T.V in an advert. I was very intrigued by the two robots and Glados's voice. I asked about it at gamestop and the clerk told me it was a very fun puzzle game so I picked it up. I played it on every platform it came out on ps3, xbox 360 and PC and have dumped countless hours into it. I sincerely don't regret spending so much time playing this game.  I don't think Ill ever stop re playing it because the story and gameplay is just so unique and interesting.
买就完事了，游戏史上最伟大的游戏之一，G姐是光圈科技第一大美女！！

Portal 2 is the perfect successor to one of the most engaging first person puzzle games in history.

New puzzles, new environments, updated game mechanics, excellent graphics, story, and of course humour.

If you've never experienced the portal series, you owe it to yourself to pick this up and the predecessor as well.

At any cost, they are great games, excellent replay value, and a timeless classic that helped shape the history of gaming.

Any modern computer can run these with ease, and they are a treat to play.

Buy it!

모든 면에서 완벽하다. 퍼즐 디자인은 흠잡을 데 없고, 그래픽은 매우 훌륭하고 시간의 시험을 견뎠습니다. 사운드트랙은 놀랍고, 스토리와 대화는 재치 있고 흥미로우며, 플레이어에게 커뮤니티에서 만든 지도와 놀라울 정도로 사용하기 쉬운 인게임 편집기를 통해 무한한 재생성을 제공합니다.

i got 88th place in speed running and its good for problem solving overall.
Played both Portal games for the first time in 2021. Resume - playable af.

This game is one of my top 5 favorites period. I've played through both the single-player and co-op campaigns at least twice. This game's unique combination of puzzle solving, parkour and communication just has no equal. Solving each "escape room" using both the tools provided (portal guns/blocks etc) and the physics engine (gaining speed from falling, body blocking to stop movement) is SO SATISFYING that you just have to "do one more" before getting off to do whatever you know, you should really be doing. Even though each room has an obvious path to complete it, the way you discover the answer is completely up to you in a "trail and error" way of thinking about how to overcome the challenge. Honestly I consider this game somewhat of a "must-play". Some of my best gaming memories are from playing this game with a special friend(s). 10/10. This game goes on sale quite often for like 2$ so make sure to buy it for friend sometime too. Coop is really where this game hits the hardest.
